product_name: The North Face Base Camp Travel Canister
long_description: The North Face Base Camp Travel Canister is a great little shower kit. It's made from a burly fabric that's traditionally used to lug gear on far-removed expeditions. Internal clip allows you to hang canister; clip hangs from a rip-and-stick strap that allows you to attach the included mirror. D-shaped zip opening. Internal mesh pockets. Base Camp Travel Canister has twin haul handles on the ends.
short_description: The North Face Base Camp Travel Canister is a great little shower kit. It's made from a burly fabric that's traditionally used to lug gear on far-removed expeditions.
